_header: Naveth my soul but fire and ice
_description: May the Lord preserve us — last ten lines of a religious poem, possibly in 8-line stanzas (abababab)

OxfJesus29.First Lines:
…Naueþ my saule bute fur and ys& þe lichome
                    eorþe and treo…
OxfJesus29.Last Lines:
…Hwenne deþ heom lat to þe murehþeþat
                    neuer ne byþ undon
